meanings.definition: Pertaining to or exhibiting deuteranomaly, a form of color blindness.
meanings.sent1: The deuteranomalous artwork appeared dull to those with normal color vision.
meanings.sent2: She had a deuteranomalous view of the world, seeing colors differently than others.
meanings.sent3: The deuteranomalous painter accidentally used the wrong shades, creating a comical effect.
meanings.sent4: His deuteranomalous perception of reality painted a unique picture of the world.
meanings.sent5: The deuteranomalous sunset looked strangely beautiful with its altered hues.

meanings.definition: A person who has deuteranomaly, a type of color vision deficiency.
meanings.sent1: The deuteranomalous struggled to distinguish between certain colors.
meanings.sent2: As a deuteranomalous, he faced challenges in identifying red and green.
meanings.sent3: The deuteranomalous at the art show found humor in their shared color confusion.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a deuteranomalous in a world of vibrant hues, always standing out.
meanings.sent5: The deuteranomalous artist's unique perspective brought a fresh vision to the gallery.
